Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Stables are good places to learn things,
so I thought I'd hear about the <clr:0000>legendary
pumpkin <clr:ffff>here, but so far, no such luck.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>I can't stop wondering... What does the
<clr:0000>Master Gourd <clr:ffff>taste like?<sp:0:4:0>I'm so preoccupied thinking about it, I can
hardly even hear the music.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>So you don't know. <sp:5:0:0>Of course! Why would
my luck be any different today?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Rumor has it that deep in a forest
somewhere, there's a legendary pumpkin
called the <clr:0000>Master Gourd<clr:ffff>.
I heard the flavor was powerful enough
to defeat any monster, no matter how
strong its stomach!
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>But everyone I ask about it looks at me
like I'm talking nonsense. <sp:5:0:0>Maybe I was fed
some bad info...
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Someone at this stable must have relevant
info. I'll have to keep asking around.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>All right! When travelers come to hear the
musical troupe perform, I'll be able to ask
them about... <sp:5:1:0>Hm?
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>A legendary sword, you say? And it's
called the <clr:0000>Master Sword<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wait, hey! So then the Master Gourd I'm
looking for...<sp:0:4:0>Is it possible that I misheard? That they
were talking about the Master Sword?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>...Nah! <sp:5:0:0>Why, just the other day I heard
a rumor about the Master Gourd being in
the <clr:0000>Lost Woods <clr:ffff>up north.
Guess you misheard, friend! That's so
embarrassing for you, hahaha!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>No musical troupe? But that means
no audience!<sp:0:4:0>I was hoping for a nice, big group of
travelers that I could ask about the
<clr:0000>legendary pumpkin<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> Hm?
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I've learned nothing about the <clr:0000>legendary
pumpkin<clr:ffff>, and now it's raining. Luck is
really not on my side...
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Don't waste my time with that <clr:0000>Master
Sword <clr:ffff>silliness. A sword in the middle of
the woods? <sp:5:0:0>Come on now!
I've finally pinpointed the Master Gourd's
location. It's in the Lost Woods.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>That means I'll have to travel to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>
of Hyrule, which is a ways off.<sp:0:4:0>But I'll head there once I'm ready.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>All right! When travelers come to hear the
musical troupe perform, I'll be able to ask
them about... <sp:5:1:0>Hm?
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, hello. You're a traveler, aren't you?
But I guess we're all travelers, aren't we,
in one way or another! Haha!
You haven't by chance heard about a
<clr:0000>legendary pumpkin<clr:ffff>, have you?
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What is it now?<sp:5:0:0> Wait...<sp:5:0:0> You know
something about the <clr:0000>legendary pumpkin<clr:ffff>,
don't you?
<sp:3:0:2:0401>If you know something, you have to
tell me! <sp:5:1:0>Please?
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>I can't stop wondering... What does the
<clr:0000>Master Gourd <clr:ffff>taste like?<sp:0:4:0>I'm so preoccupied thinking about it, I can
hardly catch a wink of sleep at night.
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I'm happy to spend my whole entire day asking
strangers about the Master Gourd. I don't care who
snickers at me...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0027:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I need to learn what I can about the Master Gourd.
It's urgent, which means there's no time to sleep!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, we meet again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>With so many travelers passing through
the stables, I thought at least one would
know about the <clr:0000>legendary pumpkin<clr:ffff>.
But sadly, no such luck as yet.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Tired_01>So you don't know what I'm talking about.
Pah! Figures!<sp:0:4:0>I need to get to the bottom of this, one
way or another. Is it true that there's a
brave hero who wields the pumpkin?
That he harvested it from deep within a
forest somewhere?<sp:0:4:0>Or that the flavor is powerful enough to
defeat any monster, no matter how strong
its stomach?
These are my unanswered questions
surrounding the legendary pumpkin
called the Master Gourd.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But everyone I ask about it looks at me
like I'm talking nonsense. Maybe I was fed
some bad info...
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Say, it's mealtime. This might be my chance to ask
other travelers about the Master Gourd.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>All I know is that it is—or was—hidden
deep in the woods somewhere...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>And that it can defeat any monster you
feed it to!
